title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 165.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 165.2 - Definition

State Regulations

As used in section 7 of ORRA, prevocational training means
that portion of an approved program of occupational and technical training
providing skills which supplement and are necessary to the successful
completion of the vocational component of such a program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
165.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
